squamous cell carcinoma.context: Squamous cell carcinoma of the larynx.

58-year-old gentleman.context: A 58-year-old gentleman who has had a history of a T3 squamous cell carcinoma of his glottic larynx

T3 squamous cell carcinoma.context: A 58-year-old gentleman who has had a history of a T3 squamous cell carcinoma of his glottic larynx

tumor persistence.context: Subsequently, biopsy confirmed tumor persistence in the right glottic region.

cartilaginous invasion.context: Also concerned for a CT scan finding of possible cartilaginous invasion at the cricoid level.

recurrence of tumor.context: A 0-degree endoscope was used to take pictures of what was apparently a recurrence of tumor along the right true vocal fold extending into the anterior arytenoid area and extending about 1 cm below into the subglottis.

total laryngectomy.context: Total laryngectomy, right level 2, 3, 4 neck dissection, tracheoesophageal puncture, cricopharyngeal myotomy, right thyroid lobectomy.

neck dissection.context: Total laryngectomy, right level 2, 3, 4 neck dissection, tracheoesophageal puncture, cricopharyngeal myotomy, right thyroid lobectomy.

tracheoesophageal puncture.context: Total laryngectomy, right level 2, 3, 4 neck dissection, tracheoesophageal puncture, cricopharyngeal myotomy, right thyroid lobectomy.

thyroid lobectomy.context: Total laryngectomy, right level 2, 3, 4 neck dissection, tracheoesophageal puncture, cricopharyngeal myotomy, right thyroid lobectomy.
